resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
A master of wisdom, an a born leader who like to takes charge. It is an intellectual, independent and masculine number. Person has the flair for acquiring wisdom.
Person is skillful and has a pleasant personality. It is a feminin number

Person has an active, warm, affectionate, and forward-looking personality. At times, they can exhibit a "happy-go-lucky" attitude. Person has a clear, focused mind and usually knows what he/she wants. They can be expressive, joyful, compassionate, and charismatic.

Person is a learned individual who is artistic and usually excels in examinations. They normally have high aspirations, and have a passion for lifelong learning. They are usually solid like a rock and can be stubborn at times

Person has a very strong character and is usually born with strong leadership traits. This person is charismatic and usually in a position above many. They have a strong instinct for things (intuitive) and have a hardworking nature, will usually achieve success in later part of life

Person is a survival who controls wealth and prosperity well. They tend to have good manners and are generally, loyal, loving, charming, creative, and have expensive taste. They usually do well in careers such as educaion, artistic works, and religion, and can be a popular figure in society. They are also a charismatic, caring, thoughtful and homely person.

Person is very skillful and detail-oriented when handling matters. They seldom forget those who had helped them before. A person is full of passion and love, charisma, charm, intelligence and appreciates gratitude. At thimes, their passion for love and romance may be on a high side. They tend to be more spiritual, to have a philosophical nature, and like to give "words of wisdom" to others.
Person is usually quiet, conservative and passive with a lively, enduring and perseverance nature
Person is usually optimistic, enthusiastic, and open-minded.
